scripts.containerised: npm run installs && npm run build && npm run compose
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-apps && npm run install-microservices && npm run install-services
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-apps && npm run ci-microservices && npm run ci-services
scripts.build: npm run build-auth && npm run build-driver && npm run build-enforcement && npm run build-permit && npm run build-administration && npm run build-vehicle && npm run build-ticket && npm run build-stripe && npm run build-landing-page && npm run build-police && npm run build-registrar
scripts.start: concurrently --names "auth,driver,enforcement,permit,administration,app,vehicle,ticket,stripe,landing-page,police,registrar" "npm run start-auth" "npm run start-driver" "npm run start-enforcement" "npm run start-permit" "npm run start-administration" "npm run start-vehicle" "npm run start-ticket" "npm run start-stripe" "npm run start-landing-page" "npm run start-police" "npm run start-registrar"
scripts.lint: npm run lint-auth && npm run lint-driver && npm run lint-enforcement && npm run lint-permit && npm run lint-administration && npm run lint-vehicle && npm run lint-ticket && npm run lint-stripe && npm run lint-police && npm run lint-registrar
scripts.test: npm run test-auth && npm run test-driver && npm run test-enforcement && npm run test-permit && npm run test-administration && npm run test-vehicle && npm run test-ticket && npm run test-stripe && npm run test-police && npm run test-registrar
